questionTitle: The spiral threads of a spider?s web have a sticky substance on them ___ insects.

anwers: as early as it would be possible
at the earliest that in could be possible

questionTitle: A log grabber has a long arm ________, which stretches out to pick up logs.

anwers: which was written by Pearl Buck
Pearl Buck being the one who wrote it

questionTitle: Henry will not be able to attend the meeting tonight because ________.
anwers: he must to teach a class
he will be teaching a class
of he will teach a class

questionTitle: Once an offending allergen has been identified ________ tests, it is possible for the doctor to give specific desensitizing injections.
